content: jane marple dishcloth by the kitchen sink shop jane marple dishcloth is the january 2026 pattern for the year of dishcloths pattern club and the design is inspired by the queen of mystery herself and one of her most loved fictional sleuths ©the kitchen sink shop size approx 8 5 by 8 5 inches needles 3 5 mm or us 4 needles straight or circular yarn estelle sudz 100% cotton 74 m or 50 g or any worsted weight cotton notions tapestry needle using us 4/3 5 mm needles and worsted weight cotton yarn cast on 36 stitches row 1 and 2 k36 row 3 k2 p1 *p1 k9 k3tog yo k1 yo p1* x 2 p1 k2 row 4 and every even row k3 *k1 p13 k1* x 2 k3 row 5 k2 p1 *p1 k7 k3tog k1 yo k1 yo k1 p1* x 2 p1 k2 row 7 k2 p1 *p1 k5 k3tog k2 yo k1 yo k2 p1* x 2 p1 k2 row 9 k2 p1 *p1 k3 k3tog k3 yo k1 yo k3 p1* x 2 p1 k2 row 11 k2 p1 *p1 yo k1 yo s1 k2tog psso k9 p1* x 2 p1 k2 row 13 k2 p1 *p1 k1 yo k1 yo k1 s1 k2tog psso k7 p1* x 2 p1 k2 row 15 k2 p1 *p1 k2 yo k1 yo k2 s1 k2tog psso k5 p1* x 2 p1 k2 row 17 k2 p1 *p1 k3 yo k1 yo k3 s1 k2tog psso k3 p1* x 2 p1 k2 row 18 same as row 4 repeat row 3 to 18 twice more 3 total repeat row 1 and 2 bind off wet block and weave in ends congrats you re done here is a link to my youtube channel where you will find quick video tutorials to help you with knitting basics the kitchen sink shop - youtube questions email me at thekitchensinkshop@gmail com i d love to see your jane marple dishcloth tag me on instagram @thekitchensinkshop #janemarpledishcloth ©the kitchen sink shop
